hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" GIT_VERSION="v0" TIME_VERSION="1" IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1" URLPKGFILE="newpkgship.rpm" URLPKGPANELFILE="newpkgshippanel.rpm" PKGFILE="pkgship-new.rpm" PKGPANELFILE="pkgship-panel-new.rpm" PROJECT_NAME="openeuler-hk-package-manage" set -e echo $PACKAGE_URL echo 'lllllllllllllll'
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi TIME_VERSION=$(date +%s)
IMAGE_VERSION=$GIT_VERSION.$TIME_VERSION echo $IMAGE_VERSION
rm -rf *.rpm rm -rf *.rpm.1
wget -q -O $URLPKGFILE $PACKAGE_URL wget -q -O $URLPKGPANELFILE $PACKAGE_PANEL_URL
echo 'after wget' ls -al
sleep 5
echo 'after sleep' ls -al
#if [ -e "$URLPKGPANELFILE" ] && [ `du -s $URLPKGPANELFILE | awk '{print $1}'` -gt 1 ]; then # for rpmpanelfile in 'pkgship-panel*.rpm'; do # rm -rf $rpmpanelfile # done mv $URLPKGPANELFILE $PKGPANELFILE #else # echo "Use old pkgship file." # rm -rf $URLPKGPANELFILE #fi #echo 'after panel' #ls
#if [ -e "$URLPKGFILE" ] && [ `du -s $URLPKGFILE | awk '{print $1}'` -gt 1 ]; then # for rpmfile in 'pkgship*.rpm'; do # rm -rf $rpmfile # done mv $URLPKGFILE $PKGFILE #else # echo "Use old pkgship file." # rm -rf $URLPKGFILE #fi #echo 'after pkgship' #ls
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com
docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/packagemanage:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/packagemanage:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/packagemanage:$IMAGE_VERSION
docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/dbgetinit:$IMAGE_VERSION ./dbinit docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/dbgetinit:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/dbgetinit:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "docker is not installed." fi
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/package-manage/debug else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image opensourceway/packagemanage=swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/packagemanage:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image opensourceway/dbgetinit=swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/dbgetinit:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update image to $IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
